concept.title: How-to guide concept
concept.shortdesc: How-to guides describe a set of ordered sequential steps users must complete to accomplish a specific task.

conbody.p: How-to guides assume that a user has basic knowledge of the product and the user knows what they want to achieve.
How-to guides are accessed by users who have experience with a product but need a specific question answered.
How-to guides can benefit new users who want to solve a problem instantly provided the How-to is well-written and states any prerequisite knowledge required to complete the task.
How-to guides have concise, easy-to-understand instructions that simplify complex actions.
